nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.a3.maze

Class Maze_Impl

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.a3.maze.Maze_Impl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Maze

    public class Maze_Impl
extends java.util.Observable
implements Maze
    Implements the Maze interface and is the point of interaction between the maze logic and the application.

      • moveChap

        public void moveChap(Direction dir)
        Description copied from interface: Maze
        Moves Chap one place in the given direction and makes him interact with whatever is on the tile (e.g pickup key etc.). If the move is invalid (there is a wall) he will not move but will still attempt to interact with the tile (e.g open door).
        Specified by:
        moveChap in interface Maze
        Parameters:
        dir - - The direction to move chap in
